response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Young age is generally associated with lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("male", "medium", "Males tend to have a higher rate of rearrest compared to females, but this is not always the case."),
    ("race_white", "low", "White individuals typically have a lower rearrest rate compared to other races."),
    ("arrests_no_convictions", "low", "A single arrest without conviction suggests lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("height_weight", "low", "Physical attributes like height and weight do not directly correlate with criminal behavior."),
    ("marital_status_single", "medium", "Single individuals may have higher risk due to lack of social ties and support structures."),
    ("living_arrangement_alone", "high", "Living alone can increase risk of recidivism due to lack of supervision and accountability."),
    ("education_high_school_diploma", "low", "Higher education levels are generally associated with lower criminal behavior."),
    ("enrolled_in_college", "low", "Enrollment in college may indicate a desire for change and lower risk."),
    ("employment_history", "low", "Having held a job during the year suggests stability and lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("drug_use_past_4_years_marijuana", "medium", "Marijuana use is generally considered less risky than other drugs, but any drug use increases risk."),
    ("depression_status_not_depressed", "low", "Not feeling depressed may indicate better mental health and lower risk."),
    ("family_background_large_household", "low", "Growing up in a large household may provide more support and supervision."),
    ("urban_area_residence", "medium", "Urban areas often have higher crime rates, which could increase risk."),
    ("god_involvement_none", "low", "Lack of religious involvement does not directly correlate with criminal behavior.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 170 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 2-year college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological dad in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
